Name: WhenNightComes
About the game: WhenNightComes tells a story that kinds of monsters are invading to Earth.And humans are falling back, You are a hero solider that fight with tides of creatures in total dark night to defend human terrtory. Features: In this game, you need to fight in a total dark enviroment and enemies show up from the dark. Solider, you need to pick up everything you find to defeat the enemies. When you lose all your health ,you will lose your game entirely. Weapons bullets provide some special effects.
